basics.name: Mike Yates
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Hello! I'm Mike Yates, Jr. Web Developer with eclectic interests. I have experience with a wide gamut of projects, from large enterprise data driven web apps to small static sites. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including C#, Python, JavaScript, and SQL. I have had lots of experience interacting with customers and strive to achieve their visions as tangible results.

highlights: Design and develop web applications using .NET Web Forms
Perform a full spectrum of web-related tasks including design and layout, graphic creation and optimization, server-side programming, and API integration.
Integrated multiple data sources (ESRI, internal data gathering) and created a cocesive UI for representation the merged data
Support and communicate with internal clients to define business requirements.
Oversaw scorekeeping, audio mixing, and presentation of a 75+ attendee trivia venue.
Developed and maintained a dynamic Excel spreadsheet to manage and export scores.
Prototyped an automated score importer to integrate with CCT's CMS
Developed a music request web application for players to pick songs for the trivia playlists
